name: Star Shooter (BSQUARED)
description:
Your spaceship must traverse the depths of space looking for a new home. You take control of the missiles fired by the ship to remove all obstacles in your path and orbit nearby planets to assess them for life.

Use Space to fire your star.

Up arrow speeds up the star, down slows it down.

Use Left and Right arrows to change direction.

Originally made for the weekly game Jam theme "Shooting Star"

Code was created by me but assets are from the Unity Asset Store.
